author: nspiegelberg
msg: Fix TestSeekTo. Alters test to use KeyValues for the blockindex instead of arbitrary byte arrays

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Added the ability for the HFile CLI to print the full block
index details.  Also corrected printKey functionality.  Using this to
debug the HFOF corruption that occurred last Thursday

author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBASE-3481: max seq id in flushed file can be larger than its correct value causing data loss during recovery
(Ryan beat me to the patch). Bringing the patch in.
running unit tests right now. And will do some more kill tests as well before

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Add options parsing & RS Round Robin to rolling split program
1. Add options parsing to configure HBase settings + # of outstanding splits
2. Group regions by RS & round-robin them to spread compaction load

author: nspiegelberg
msg: increase default rolling restart sleep to 60 until faster rolls can be tested more
